rows.label: tlk001901_06_msg0001
rows.name:
Thank you for watching over Rex.
As his guardian, allow me to express my gratitude.

rows.label: tlk001901_06_msg0002
rows.name:
If he just charges straight ahead without looking,
he can sometimes end up on the wrong path.

rows.label: tlk001901_06_msg0003
rows.name:
It's because you are all by his side showing him the way
that Rex can stay on the right path.

rows.label: tlk001901_06_msg0004
rows.name:
No, it's just, he has such a grown-up look on his face.
I just thought something inside him must have matured.

rows.label: tlk001901_06_msg0005
rows.name:
I've been looking after that boy since he was little.
I can tell right away when he's different from usual.

rows.label: tlk001901_06_msg0006
rows.name: Please continue to look after Rex from now on.

rows.label: tlk001901_06_msg0007
rows.name:
You've been coming home a lot recently.
You must be busy, so I'm grateful.

rows.label: tlk001901_06_msg0008
rows.name: If you have a moment, you should go see the children.

rows.label: tlk001901_06_msg0009
rows.name:
Those kids are always
wanting to see you.

rows.label: tlk001901_06_msg0013
rows.name:
I intend to support you in anything
you want to do.

rows.label: tlk001901_06_msg0014
rows.name:
So don't you lose heart along the way.
See it through to the end!
